item.title: About Teaching Nonsense
item.author: matiasandina@gmail.com (Matias Andina)
item.description: Life without purpose Living without a purpose is something I am unable to do. I am into the rules of the game, the idea that thereâ€™s a goal, and we are trying to achieve something, do something, create an object or service that was not there before and now fulfills a function. There are few games that I play for the sake of keep playing like the learning game. But, more often than not, I stand on the side of finite games.

item.title: How do you make a cake?
item.author: matiasandina@gmail.com (Matias Andina)
item.description: This post is inspired by my brief experience with the education system in the United States (US) and the way some students approach learning. The take home message culture Synthetic questions, Summarize How do you make a cake? I
